meanings.meaning: action that is necessary according to custom/law

examples: Your acceptance into the club will be a mere formality.
It only took a few minutes to complete the legal formalities.
Let's dispense with the formalities and get down to work.
She was clearly the best candidate for the job, so her interview was just a formality.
It is important to be aware of the level of formality required at any social function.
She preferred to maintain a cool formality in her dealings with her manager.
